WFH-Essentials.title: Cross Trainer C-500
WFH-Essentials.description: The C-500 cross-trainer delivers an instinctively natural stride that ensures a safe and consistent strengthening workout for your upper and lower body with reduced stress on your knees. The 8-level resistance control provides additional personalization for your workouts with heart-rate monitoring, making it an ideal fitness companion for your everyday workouts.
features: 8kg flywheel for a smooth noise-free workout

WFH-Essentials.title: Exercise Cycle AB-100
WFH-Essentials.description: Experience total elliptical and upper body training in one machine with Reach AB-100 air bike exercise cycle. The dual-action arms and manual resistance control ensure a true full-body workout from start till the end while the belt drive system ensures a natural position of cycling giving you the confidence to reach your fitness goals every time.

WFH-Essentials.title: Felix 3-Seater Fabric Sofa (Blue)
WFH-Essentials.description: Elegance meets comfort with the plush Felix Couch. With unmatched comfort and endless options to deck it up, your couch crasher friends will love it, and so will you

WFH-Essentials.title: Barney Leather Recliner (Brown)
WFH-Essentials.description: We know you want this already! The comfort of putting up your feet and sinking into the comfy Barney recliner is unmatchable. The cushy seat comes with a 160-degrees recline feature.

WFH-Essentials.title: Dell XPS 13 , Intel Core i5 processor , 8th Gen - ( 8 GB / 256 GB SSD / Win 10 Pro OS , 13.3 inch,Silver )
WFH-Essentials.description: A laptop that is made to cater to students as well as working professionals with its eighth-generation quad-core i5 processor. Carry this compact lightweight 13.3-inch display laptop anywhere to multitask on-the-go. Let it be work, play or leisure, the Dell XPS 13 will let you do it all.

packages.title: Double Bed with Fridge & Washing Machine

product.title: Double Door Fridge (240 Litre)
product.description: Our double-door refrigerators powerful cooling system ensures your food stays fresh & healthy. While it’s quick cooling saves you time, the energy efficient technology ensures great cooling at low costs.

product.title: Top Load Washing Machine
product.description: Stains, dirt or lint—get effortless cleaning with a Top Load Washing Machine. Equipped with multiple wash programs and a preset water level selector, save time on laundry without any hassle. This top load fully automatic washing machine is ideal for all your daily washing needs.

product.title: Aurora Wooden Queen Bed (6x5)
product.description: The Aurora bed's frame provides a simple & stylish look to your room. The light brown colour of the bed matches any decor. The cot's frame has a low height & a headboard for you to lean comfortably.
features: To fit Mattress Size: 72 inches L x 60 inches B

product.title: Poise Wooden Queen Bed (6x5)
product.description: Comfort and compactness, get them both with the Poise queen bed. The bed's strong metal frame ensures durability while the honey-toned solid wood adds both style and comfort to the mix.

product.title: Single Door Fridge (190 Litre)
product.description: There’s always room for more food with a Single Door Refrigerator (190L). Designed for the modern home, this refrigerator effortlessly cools and keeps all your fruits and veggies fresh for a longer time. With best-in-class storage, corral your way to your favorite food station.

product.description: The Induction comes with digital display timer, variable temperature selection and preset menus to suit your cooking needs.

product.description: Entertainment is just a click away with our Smart LED TV. Enjoy your favourite shows with high quality. Experience television like it was meant to be. So sit back & relax!
